::Spears::

She lookd into the pod and looked at Striker."Gee, thanks."
she climbed in and sat in the seat. "OUCH!" she sat on her own quills 
again.  Now she had two reasons to hate flying, one was the fear of 
heights, the other was the seats always made her sit on her quills.
"Let's just hurry up and get home. OK?" she gave Striker a mock stern 
look.
This just wasn't her day.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> At the entrance to the pod, Striker turns around. "Nothing. I was 
just 
> wondering."
> 
> Striker takes a step forward, the pod opening. He steps aside, 
motioning her 
> to enter. "After you."
